ygData.subject: Re: Best 1hs (Spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info!!! I currently wield a Tomahawk and Screaming Mace, and really have come to like that combo. The Cystalline Sword (which I have heard
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info!!!

I currently wield a Tomahawk and Screaming Mace, and really have come to
like that combo.

The Cystalline Sword (which I have heard rumors of) sounds very interesting,
but if you've not seen it yet at 43rd, I doubt my little 23rd level butt
wont get one for quite some time (smile).

Thanks again,
Tim
Tallonn Stringfellow, Bertox
-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, June 11, 1999 9:14 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Best 1hs (Spoiler)


>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>actually one of the best 1hs weapons there is just started appearing on
mith
>marr, the crystalline sword dmg11 del38. it is pending lore so you may
only
>use one, but it really rocks. hopefully i can get one soon but i do not
know
>where it comes from as of yet, the rumor is permafrost, if anyone knows
tell
>us! =)
>
>as far as the staff of writhing, on the kobold noble in solusek B. the
>demon claw, on the avatar of fear in cazic-thule. the black enamelled mace
>in lower guk, not sure on what i have not gotten one yet. unfortunately
you
>can use staff or claw, but not both, each requires to be in primary hand.
>and consequently you can not duel wield them, mor many other weps that are
>now pending lore.
>
>Shada Silverleaf, Level 43 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
>
>
>
